title: Name a Character in Twisted Metal - Kinda Feudy
description:
Greg hosted the premiere of Peacock’s Twisted Metal at San Diego Comic-Con, and after the screening, he played a live game of Kinda Feudy with the audience! You can catch all 10 episodes of Twisted Metal streaming now on Peacock: https://www.peacocktv.com/stream-tv/twisted-metal 
#sponsored 

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
